title: Understanding Enthalpy in Cycles
text: When a system undergoes a complete cycle of processes, it begins and ends at the same state. What does this imply about extensive properties?

title: Properties of a Cycle
text: In thermodynamics, which properties are extensive and changed when a system returns to its initial state after a cycle?

title: Change in Enthalpy for a Cycle
text: Since enthalpy is a state function, when a system undergoes a complete cycle, does the enthalpy change? Why or why not?

title: Determining the Change in Enthalpy (ΔH)
text: Given that the system returns to its original state at the end of the cycle, the change in enthalpy (ΔH) over the cycle is..
